infos.value: It looks like a dead end for you. Give yourself up!
What...?
Mia...? But why...?
...F-forgive me.
I'm sure you had a reason.
I thought you went to Lykeros...
I did.
But that kingdom was destroyed a while ago by Rundall, wasn't it?
...It was. But my mother and I managed to escape to the border.
And you came here after hearing about the village, I take it?
...Th-that's right.
Then why did you run away from us?
What...?
Could it be that you feel guilty about something?
Lynx, that's enough.
Stay out of this.
Have you nothing to say?
I thought you would be mad because I left my kingdom on my own...
If your kingdom is gone, then so are your obligations.
You and your mother ought to live in the village again.
...Th-thank you.
Gouga will be no match for all of us!
...Indeed. I doubt Gouga expects us to go on the offensive now.
Let us push forward, to Gouga.
